name: confluent-zookeeper
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 4000 MB MEM | 5000 MB Disk
postInstallNotes:
Apache Zookeeper by Confluent is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/confluent-zookeeper/
	Community Support: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
Apache Zookeeper by Confluent is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/confluent-zookeeper/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
